column6:
With a Brooklyn housing project held hostage by Crossfire's a psychotic mind-control gang, and hundreds of innocent lives at the mercy of the Controller, the Mandrill and the Corruptor, Spider-Man finally learns the awful truth behind the super-villain gang war terrorizing his city.,2005,7
32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Tony Bedard | inker:Raul Fernandez | penciller (cover):Manuel Garcia | letterer:Cory Petit | colorist:Chris Sotomayor
